title: How to Be the Master at Hide'n'seek In The Dark

steps.headline: Plan the game out if you're doing this at a party.
steps.description: Make sure everyone knows who goes first, second, and so on.

steps.headline: Make sure you have a full day to yourself.
steps.description: Now take a notebook and a pencil and search your house. Look for good hiding spots. If there's a really good spot, but say it has clothes in there, CLEAR IT OUT! Make room for some really good spots.

steps.headline: Sort out all of the hiding spots that you marked down.
steps.description: Take another piece of paper and on one side put "OK Hiding Spots" and on the other put "Really Good Hiding Spots" or whatever you want to, and go through the house again, making sure you didn't miss any spots. Make sure you look outside, around your house, backyard, and places like that.

steps.headline: Take a fairly big paper and draw the outline of your house on it.
steps.description: Fill it in. Mark what's in it and whose room it is. Even put beds, tables, dressers, etc. Now take a colored marker and mark the places that are best. Carry this with you. Fold it up and slip it into your pocket or something.

steps.headline: Make a list of places base could be.
steps.description: The bedroom. The living room. Kitchen. Family room...whatever. Now make a list of hiding spots near each one.

steps.headline: Don't hide with anyone unless you know they won't say where you are if they get caught.
steps.description: If anything, bring a little cousin or someone who will follow you. Send them out if you wanna see if it's safe.

steps.headline: Be alert.
steps.description: See everything. Hear everything. Listen to everything.

steps.headline: Think ahead.
steps.description: Don't play the boring way! Move to different hiding spots, but make sure no one is there to see or hear you. If you have a dog, you should keep it away. It will most likely follow you or stare at you, also a cat.

steps.headline: Put on some soft music, so if you make a little or big sound, more than likely, no one will hear.
Try not to repeat hiding spots unless the hiding spot you've been using hasn't been found yet.
steps.description: Use it to your advantage! You could hide out the whole game and win! But where's the fun in that?

steps.headline: Depending on where you're trying to move to, walk slowly, or try to walk without making a sound.
